title: Deauth Defense
description:
Mira's friends keep getting disconnected from Wi-Fi and end up on a suspicious network.

Objective: Block deauthentication frames from the rogue AP.
dialogue: Mira: "Ugh, every time we try to connect, we get kicked off and end up on some weird network!"
Mira: "I think someone is forcing us off the real Wi-Fi. It's making everyone nervous."
Mira: "Can you help me figure out how to stop these disconnects? I want my friends to feel safe online."
hints: Deauth attack frames spike in monitor mode.
Try using monitor mode and frame filtering.

validation.command: iw dev wlan0 set type managed
